templates.template:
<xf:css src="accordion.css" />
<xf:js src="addons/accordion.js" />
<xf:if is="$slides is not empty"> <dl class="accordion {$blockAlign}" data-duration="400" data-xf-init="accordion" style="display:block;width:{$width}{$widthType};" > <xf:foreach loop="$slides" value="$slide" i="$i" count="$total"> <xf:set var="$slideClass"><xf:if is="$i == 1">first<xf:elseif is="$i == $total" />last<xf:else />between</xf:if></xf:set> <dt class="{$slideClass} {$slide.class_open}" style="text-align:{$slide.align};"> <xf:if is="$slide.title is not empty">{$slide.title|raw}<xf:else />{{phrase('accordion_text_slide')}}{$i}</xf:if> </dt> <dd class="{$slideClass} {$slide.open} {$slide.class_open}" style="{{ $slide.height ? 'height:' . $slide.height . 'px;overflow-x:hidden;overflow-y:auto;' : ''}}"> {$slide.content|raw} </dd> </xf:foreach> </dl> <xf:else /> no slide </xf:if>
